newsitem.title: USA: RehabCare Group buys back 999,955 shares.
newsitem.headline: RehabCare Group buys back 999,955 shares.

text.p: RehabCare Group Inc said Wednesday it purchased 999,955 shares of its common stock at $22.50 per share in a Dutch Auction self-tender offer. A total of 1,051,870 shares were tendered.
It said the final proration factor was 95.069 percent.
The offer expired at midnight EST on February 28. RehabCare had offered to buy 925,000 shares at prices specified by shareholders, ranging from $20 to $22.50.

It exercised its right under terms of the offer to accept Shares purchased represent about 21.24 percent of the those outstanding immediately prior to the tender offer. Following the purchase, the company had about 3.8 million shares of common stock outstanding.
RehabCare provides acute rehabilitation, subacute, outpatient and therapist staffing services on a contract basis.
